languages.text: "Справедливости ради, Ирлиэт, не вам упрекать Человечество в междоусобицах. Все, что я успел узнать за последнее время о вашем племени, говорит о том, что склонность к распрям — универсальное стремление".
"In all fairness, Yrliet, you are in no position to judge humans for fighting among themselves. Everything I have learned lately about your kind suggests that a proclivity for feuding is universal."
languages.original_text: "Справедливости ради, Ирлиэт, не вам упрекать Человечество в междоусобицах. Все, что я успел узнать за последнее время о вашем племени, говорит о том, что склонность к распрям — универсальное стремление".

traits.locale_text: "In all fairness, Yrliet, you are in no position to judge humans for fighting among themselves. Everything I have learned lately about your kind suggests that a proclivity for feuding is universal."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "In all fairness, Yrliet, you are in no position to judge humans for fighting among themselves. Everything I have learned lately about your kind suggests that a proclivity for feuding is universal."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我说句公道话，伊莉耶特，你根本没有资格评判人类之间的争斗。考虑到我们最近从你的族人那里学到的东西，一切都表明，争斗的倾向是普遍存在的。”
languages.original_text: "In all fairness, Yrliet, you are in no position to judge humans for fighting among themselves. Everything I have learned lately about your kind suggests that a proclivity for feuding is universal."

traits.locale_text: “我说句公道话，伊莉耶特，你根本没有资格评判人类之间的争斗。考虑到我们最近从你的族人那里学到的东西，一切都表明，争斗的倾向是普遍存在的。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Très franchement, Yrliet, il me semble que vous êtes plutôt mal placée pour reprocher aux humains de se quereller entre eux. Tout ce que j'ai appris sur vos semblables dernièrement me laisse à penser que la propension au conflit est universelle. »
languages.original_text: "In all fairness, Yrliet, you are in no position to judge humans for fighting among themselves. Everything I have learned lately about your kind suggests that a proclivity for feuding is universal."

traits.locale_text: « Très franchement, Yrliet, il me semble que vous êtes plutôt mal placée pour reprocher aux humains de se quereller entre eux. Tout ce que j'ai appris sur vos semblables dernièrement me laisse à penser que la propension au conflit est universelle. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Sinceramente, Yrliet, no está en posición de juzgar a los humanos por sus luchas internas. Todo lo que he descubierto sobre su gente últimamente indica que la tendencia a las luchas internas es universal».
languages.original_text: "In all fairness, Yrliet, you are in no position to judge humans for fighting among themselves. Everything I have learned lately about your kind suggests that a proclivity for feuding is universal."

traits.locale_text: «Sinceramente, Yrliet, no está en posición de juzgar a los humanos por sus luchas internas. Todo lo que he descubierto sobre su gente últimamente indica que la tendencia a las luchas internas es universal».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「公平を期すために言っておきますが、ユリエット、あなたは人間同士の争いを批判する立場にありません。あなたたちの種族に関して最近わかったことのすべてが、確執を好む性向とは普遍的なものであると示唆しています」
languages.original_text: "In all fairness, Yrliet, you are in no position to judge humans for fighting among themselves. Everything I have learned lately about your kind suggests that a proclivity for feuding is universal."

traits.locale_text: 「公平を期すために言っておきますが、ユリエット、あなたは人間同士の争いを批判する立場にありません。あなたたちの種族に関して最近わかったことのすべてが、確執を好む性向とは普遍的なものであると示唆しています」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Nichts für ungut, Yrliet, doch es steht Euch wohl kaum zu, über die Menschen zu urteilen, weil sie sich untereinander bekämpfen. Alles, was ich in letzter Zeit über Euresgleichen erfahren habe, legt nahe, dass eine Neigung zu internen Fehden universell ist."
languages.original_text: "In all fairness, Yrliet, you are in no position to judge humans for fighting among themselves. Everything I have learned lately about your kind suggests that a proclivity for feuding is universal."

traits.locale_text: "Nichts für ungut, Yrliet, doch es steht Euch wohl kaum zu, über die Menschen zu urteilen, weil sie sich untereinander bekämpfen. Alles, was ich in letzter Zeit über Euresgleichen erfahren habe, legt nahe, dass eine Neigung zu internen Fehden universell ist."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "In all fairness, Yrliet, you are in no position to judge humans for fighting among themselves. Everything I have learned lately about your kind suggests that a proclivity for feuding is universal."

languages.text: "Doğrusunu istersen insanları kendi aralarında savaştıkları için yargılayacak son kişisin Yrliet. Son zamanlarda türünle ilgili öğrendiğim her şey, çatışma yatkınlığınızın genelgeçer olduğunu gösteriyor."
languages.original_text: "In all fairness, Yrliet, you are in no position to judge humans for fighting among themselves. Everything I have learned lately about your kind suggests that a proclivity for feuding is universal."

traits.locale_text: "Doğrusunu istersen insanları kendi aralarında savaştıkları için yargılayacak son kişi sensin Yrliet. Senin türünle ilgili son zamanlarda öğrendiğim her şey, çatışma yatkınlığının evrensel olduğunu kanıtlıyor."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
